# Class TransformationStreamContentToText<ContentType>

Transformation stream for content-to-text processing. Processes content stream input and produces string output.

#### Type Parameters

  * ContentType = any



#### Implements

  * [ITransformationStreamContentToText](/interfaces/common_stream_interfaces.ITransformationStreamContentToText)<ContentType>
